about_the_game:
Welcome to the 16x16 Tile Adventure World!
Created with RPG Maker MZ, this game offers a unique gameplay experience where you explore random events and collect rewards. Discover the rewards of each event and navigate towards the ones you desire. Gather enough rewards and face the ultimate challenge, the Wrath of Erdin, as you become an ambassador of peace.

Simple and Charming RPG Experience!
This game follows the basic rules of RPG Maker, offering simple rules that are easy for anyone to pick up. Even those new to the genre can quickly adapt to the gameplay, where adorable monsters await. Enjoy the game with a light heart, exploring various events and collecting rewards while listening to beautiful music. Experience the joy of an adventure as if you're stepping into a fairytale!

A Game Combining the Fun of Arithmetic in a Randomly Determined World!
In this game, you can easily assess the attack power of your envoys and the health and defense of monsters, allowing you to plan your attacks effectively each turn. Enjoy the thrill of defeating monsters using simple addition and subtraction in a world defined by randomness. Optimize your attacks without wasting resources to experience more efficient combat. The game’s simple rules make it accessible for everyone to enjoy!

Endless Cycle of Challenge and Resurrection!
The envoy members are at risk of falling before the powerful residents of the enraged Forest of Spirits. However, they can rise again using various resurrection abilities to rejoin the battle. Experience the thrill of dice rolls and the growth of the envoy as they repeatedly fall and rise. With courage and perseverance, you will ultimately face the Wrath of Erdin. This game embodies a journey towards peace through continuous challenges and recovery. Can you become an ambassador of peace?

A new reinterpretation of nostalgia from the past!
The inspiration for this game began with JRPG games that were loved in the past. Over time, it became difficult to relive those memories in the modern era. So we created a new game by collecting only the parts we loved. We've removed the complexity of getting lost and compressed familiar stories, focusing on bold battles with monsters and growth through rewards. We recommend this game to those who want to enjoy the charm of retro style. Relive the nostalgia of the past and enjoy the simple yet familiar fun of RPGs
